title: Eisenhower National Historic Site: Teacher Workshops
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Teacher Workshops                Teacher Workshops           SUMMER DAYS WITH DOCUMENTS: THE EISENHOWER ERA JULY 20, 21, 22, 2016  Summer Days With Documents offers three days of teacher workshops: 1) Eisenhower and the World Wars, 2) Eisenhower and Diplomacy, and 3) Eisenhower and Civil Rights in which teachers team with with 20th century history experts to investigate compelling Eisenhower era documents and create reading strategies, document based learning objectives, and assessments for students. Spend one, two or all three days with us! more...
